caption: This photograph captures a scenic aerial view of a rugged coastline where the forest meets the sea. The landscape is characterized by jagged rocks and pine-covered cliffs that sharply descend to meet the turbulent, foaming ocean waves. On the left side of the image, a prominent white building with a tall, thin tower possibly a lighthouse or bell tower, stands out against the dense greenery of the trees. The rocky shoreline is dotted with small buildings and paths that weave through the area, suggesting a managed, albeit natural environment. The overall composition beautifully contrasts the wild energy of the blue sea with the serene, dark green of the forest, encapsulating a dramatic and picturesque coastal scenery.
title: Houses stand on cliffs of Pacific Grove
